title: Nassar victim tells second sentencing hearing, lock him up "for the rest of his life"
text:
Nassar victim tells second sentencing hearing, lock him up "for the rest of his life" 10:35am IST - 02:08 
Jessica Thomashow, a victim of convicted sex abuser Larry Nassar, read the first impact statement in the second sentencing hearing for the former USA Gymnastics doctor on Wednesday, asking that he be locked up ''for the rest of his life''. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
Jessica Thomashow, a victim of convicted sex abuser Larry Nassar, read the first impact statement in the second sentencing hearing for the former USA Gymnastics doctor on Wednesday, asking that he be locked up "for the rest of his life". Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2DRyh1k
